content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in München.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The landlord, Mr. Schmidt, was aiming for a monthly rent of 1000 Euros, while I, Haoyu Wang, thought that 800 Euros per month was more reasonable. We tried to find a middle ground, but we could not reach a final agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] We did not agree on a final price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Mr. Schmidt, as a 7.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
